main.name: Ethereum Elementary Earnings
main.description: Etheree(EEE) stands for Ethereum-based Elementary Earnings. Etheree's goal is to realize the ideal of providing a minimum earning to those in need, not a lot of income.
main.bio: Etheree(EEE) is a type of universal basic income that offers minimal earnings. Etheree consists of three main parts: Giver, Receiver, and Supporter.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: The donation status of various assets is disclosed transparently.

education.degree: Register your wallet address to receive minimal earnings.
education.description: Etheree(EEE) is paid simply by registering your wallet address.

education.degree: The receiver provides additional information and becomes higher level.
education.description: Additional earnings are paid according to the situation and event.

work.title: Donate in a variety of currencies. (Fiat currency, coin, token, etc.)
work.description: Various assets donated by givers are safely custody in the donation pool.

work.title: Delivering the value from developed countries to the world.
work.description: The value of one dollar in developed countries is different from its value in developing countries.
